00040 #ifndef __CVMX_BOOTLOADER__
00041 #define __CVMX_BOOTLOADER__
00042 
00043 /**
00044  * @file
00045  *
00046  * Bootloader definitions that are shared with other programs
00047  *
00048  * <hr>$Revision: 124466 $<hr>
00049  */
00050 
00051 /* The bootloader_header_t structure defines the header that is present
00052 ** at the start of binary u-boot images.  This header is used to locate the bootloader
00053 ** image in NAND, and also to allow verification of images for normal NOR booting.
00054 ** This structure is placed at the beginning of a bootloader binary image, and remains
00055 ** in the executable code.
00056 */
00057 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_MAGIC 0x424f4f54  /* "BOOT" in ASCII */
00058 
00059 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_COMMENT_LEN  64
00060 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_VERSION_LEN  64
00061 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_MAX_SIZE      0x200   /* limited by the space to the next exception handler */
00062 
00063 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_CURRENT_MAJOR_REV 1
00064 #define BOOTLOADER_HEADER_CURRENT_MINOR_REV 2
00065 /* Revision history
00066 * 1.1  Initial released revision. (SDK 1.9)
00067 * 1.2  TLB based relocatable image (SDK 2.0)
00068 *
00069 *
00070 */
00071 
00072 /* offsets to struct bootloader_header fields for assembly use */
00073 #define GOT_ADDRESS_OFFSET       48
00074 
00075 #define LOOKUP_STEP (64*1024)
00076 
00077 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00078 typedef struct bootloader_header {
00079     uint32_t jump_instr;    /* Jump to executable code following the
00080                  ** header.  This allows this header to
00081                  ** be (and remain) part of the executable image)
00082                  */
00083     uint32_t nop_instr; /* Must be 0x0 */
00084     uint32_t magic;     /* Magic number to identify header */
00085     uint32_t hcrc;      /* CRC of all of header excluding this field */
00086 
00087     uint16_t hlen;      /* Length of header in bytes */
00088     uint16_t maj_rev;   /* Major revision */
00089     uint16_t min_rev;   /* Minor revision */
00090     uint16_t board_type;    /* Board type that the image is for */
00091 
00092     uint32_t dlen;      /* Length of data (immediately following header) in bytes */
00093     uint32_t dcrc;      /* CRC of data */
00094     uint64_t address;   /* Mips virtual address */
00095     uint32_t flags;
00096     uint16_t image_type;    /* Defined in bootloader_image_t enum */
00097     uint16_t resv0;     /* pad */
00098 
00099     uint32_t reserved1;
00100     uint32_t reserved2;
00101     uint32_t reserved3;
00102     uint32_t reserved4;
00103 
00104     char comment_string[BOOTLOADER_HEADER_COMMENT_LEN]; /* Optional, for descriptive purposes */
00105     char version_string[BOOTLOADER_HEADER_VERSION_LEN]; /* Optional, for descriptive purposes */
00106 } __attribute__ ((packed)) bootloader_header_t;
00107 
00108 /* Defines for flag field */
00109 #define BL_HEADER_FLAG_FAILSAFE         (1)
00110 
00111 typedef enum {
00112     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_UNKNOWN = 0x0,
00113     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_STAGE2,     /** Binary bootloader stage2 image */
00114     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_STAGE3,     /** Binary bootloader stage3 image */
00115     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_NOR,        /** Binary bootloader for NOR boot */
00116     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_PCIBOOT,    /** Binary bootloader for PCI boot */
00117     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_UBOOT_ENV,  /** Environment for u-boot */
00118     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_PRE_UBOOT,  /** Bootloader before U-Boot (stage 1/1.5) */
00119     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_STAGE1,     /** NOR stage 1 bootloader */
00120     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_MAX,
00121     /* Range for customer private use.  Will not be used by Cavium Inc. */
00122     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_CUST_RESERVED_MIN = 0x1000,
00123     BL_HEADER_IMAGE_CUST_RESERVED_MAX = 0x1fff
00124 } bootloader_image_t;
00125 
00126 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00127 
00128 /* Maximum address searched for NAND boot images and environments.  This is used
00129 ** by stage1 and stage2. */
00130 #define MAX_NAND_SEARCH_ADDR   0x800000
00131 
00132 /* Maximum address to look for start of normal bootloader */
00133 #define MAX_NOR_SEARCH_ADDR   0x400000
00134 
00135 /* Defines for RAM based environment set by the host or the previous bootloader
00136 ** in a chain boot configuration. */
00137 
00138 #define U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_ADDR     (0x1000)
00139 #define U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_SIZE     (0x1000)
00140 #define U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_CRC_SIZE (0x4)
00141 #define U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_ADDR_2   (U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_ADDR + U_BOOT_RAM_ENV_SIZE)
00142 /** Address of environment in L2 cache if booted from cache */
00143 #define U_BOOT_CACHE_ENV_ADDR   (0x000ff000)
00144 /** Size of environment in L2 cache */
00145 #define U_BOOT_CACHE_ENV_SIZE   (0x1000)
00146 
00147 #endif /* __CVMX_BOOTLOADER__ */
